name: Customizable GDPR Cookie Consent Banner
author: AppifyCommerce

sections.description:
Just one click ensures you are fully compliant with EU cookie laws! The
Customizable GDPR Cookie Consent Banner is responsive to devices and no additional steps are required to install the plugin just add it and customize it the way you want. Easily customize an unobtrusive banner without coding! Included are the following features:

  • Change banner styles
  • Customize banners
  • Add icons / edit icons
  • Simple and responsive extension to display the cookie consent message for cookie usage by the site.
  • Once the user clicks on the “Close” button it disappears for specified days, by default it is 31 days.
  • You can place a link for your privacy policy page from options available in the backend.
  • Easily change styles and text of messages.
sections.installation:
Upload the Customizable GDPR Cookie Consent Banner plugin to your blog, activate it, customize desire design.

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
